post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
My client in the Concord area (Keele and Highway #7 area) is looking for a developer to join their team.



If you would you are interested in the following role, please submit your resume with salary or rate expectations and let me know your current availability.



Required Technical skills



•         Front end development expertise



•         Proficiency in PHP, JavaScript, XML, HTML and MXML



•         Experience with Flash Media Server



•         Knowledge of server side technologies, such as Remoting, .Net, C#, Flex, Air a plus



•         Strong experience in developing Flash Web based applications





The Eligible candidate must have



•         Minimum 3 years experience in programming and Web development environment



•         Excellent communications skills.



•         Work well in a team environment



•         Have exceptional problem-solving skills











Regards,

Hanna

placingITpeople incorporated

recruiter

phone & fax 416 504 9933

hanna@placingITpeople.ca

www.placingITpeople.ca
post.title: looking for a developer to join their team
